title: You have to spend 1 week in a cabin in the woods with your top 3 mastery champions
body:
what happens in that time?
{{champion:44}}: Provides entertainment and field trips to large gem sights (He never stops talking on those trips though)
{{champion:24}}: Get's bored quickly and begins to fight with the local wild life using only a fallen tree branch and some pine cones
{{champion:61}}: By day, studies the local wild life that Jax has not beaten into submission and sings with the birds.
At night, stalks everyone creepily from the shadows, we never go out at night, people have had a tendency to... **Disappear!**

replies.body:
{{champion:421}} *ults away*
{{champion:80}} *ults away*
{{champion:32}}: "Let's be friends forever!"

R.I.P. me

a support opponent. gg afk report noob lucian

{{champion:89}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:131}} 

I cower in the corner as Leona and Diana argue, and Katarina is somewhere else practicing her knife throwing
an entire week trapped in a cabin with {{champion:131}}'s  jokes. I can only imagine.

{{champion:131}} "What do you call a Solari that's had a good meal?"
Me: "Diana, I'm really not in the mood-"
{{champion:131}} "A FULL moon!"
{{champion:89}} "You're probably cringing after that one."
Me: "Thank goodness, somebody understand me-"
{{champion:89}} "Because I have a better one! What do you call the winning round in a Solari tennis match?"
Me: "Leona, for goodness' sakes-"
{{champion:89}} "A sunSET!"
Me: "Ugh... Hey, Katarina, do you wanna-"
{{champion:55}} "No." *Shunpos away*
Actually you are running for your life cause Kat is practicing her knife throwing... On you!

{{champion:35}}
You're walking through the woods. There's no one around, and your phone is dead. Out of the corner of your eye, you spot him... *Ronald McShaco*...
He's following you, about thirty feet back. He runs into the fog and vanishes! *Ronald McShaco*... 
He pops out of the shadows and is almost upon you now, and you can see there's paint on his face. My god, there's paint EVERYWHERE!

Running for your life, 
from Ronald McShaco!
Brandishing two knives,
its Ronald McShaco!
Lurking in the shadooowwss...
League of Legends champion Ronald McShaco!
Camping in the woods,
Ronald McShaco!
Killing for sport,
Ronald McShaco!
Eating all the boOoOoo-

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ux1MPZOPgmk

WOAH THIS IS GOING SOMEWHERE

{{champion:107}} Shhhh... I'm hunting wabbits!

{{champion:68}} Attaches a wood cutter to the front of his suit and proceeds to mow down the entire forest.

{{champion:245}} : Paradoxes of himself crowd the cabin.
{{champion:223}} : Eats all the food then stares at me voraciously.
{{champion:98}} : Is stopping {{champion:223}} from eating me.

{{champion:37}} Plays songs until we start getting bored, then ults us. Kicks me out of the remaining bed at night. (I snore...)
{{champion:150}} Attempts to crush me during campfire stories cause he gets scared. Eats ALL of the smores.
{{champion:67}} Pins me to a wall at any mention of evil. Hates any mention that her outfit is stupid.

{{champion:201}}Gives mustaches to all the woodland creatures and the other two champions while telling heartwarming stories of freljord history.
{{champion:78}} Enjoys listening to Braum's stories.
{{champion:81}} Assures the rest of the champions that the fact that they are lost in the forest for a week is not because of the lack  of a map.
Me Laughing the whole time.
Inb4 Poppy gives Braum her hammer and he becomes the true hero. Ezreal gets lost in the forest, stacking his tear.

{{champion:201}}: Milking his goat and telling tales of the people he's saved
{{champion:412}}: Keeps trying to steal my soul
{{champion:103}}: Tries(and fails) to charm the wolves outside of the cabin

**Day 1**: I was the first to arrive at the cabin, for what it’s worth. A log cabin built for four. It doesn’t have electricity, but at least there’s running water. There’s a kitchen, and a well-stocked pantry to go with it. Around the cabin is a small clearing, and beyond that, forest. Yellow squirrels and enormous deer — the animals here are nothing I know of. We seem to be part way up a mountain, but the summer air is still pleasantly warm.

I hadn’t had much of a chance to explore before the first new arrival turned up. She called herself Anivia {{champion:34}} , and seems to be a massive, telepathic bird made out of ice. I knew the others on this vacation (?) might be weird, but I wasn’t expecting anything like that. Anivia seems pleasant enough. She says she’s some sort of guardian of winter, that she wishes me no ill, quote “mortal”, and that she looks forward to meeting the “other”. All the same, I’m kind of glad she doesn’t fit inside the cabin.

The remaining two of our group of four showed up I think late afternoon (No electricity + What’s clockwork? = No clocks). I had not anticipated there being only one other human. Actually, I don’t think I realized there were intelligent nonhumans. I think I’ll keep to myself, though. Of the last two, one’s a boar, and one’s a boor. Apparently Anivia and this Sejuani {{champion:113}}  gal know each other and hate each other. I didn’t hear all of their row, but there was something like “Sirilda would do what is necessary!” and “All I do is necessary!” and much back and forth along that theme. Is Sirilda the boar? Er, is the boar intelligent?

I made myself dinner. It’s so much easier to be on a good schedule out here, away from it all. Anivia will be roosting on top of the cabin, apparently, and Sejuani said the boar will be going out in the woods. She chose the bed farthest from the fireplace, which is fine by me. I’ve decided to record a journal of this adventure. How did I end up here anyhow?

_To be continued_

{{champion:89}}  Wakes up at the crack of dawn to make breakfast and do other mom-like things.

{{champion:29}}  Only wants the egg shells for breakfast. Curls up in the bathtub he filled with garbage and mud for most of the trip.

{{champion:203}}  Wolf keeps bring the freshest cuts of meat to the cabin for supper...so much meat. Everywhere.  Lamb dances through the forest, singing songs and bringing back flowers to put in the tub to aggravate Twitch.
LOL I can so see Kindred doing that rofl.

{{champion:35}} : Spends hours placing Jack-in-the-Boxes everywhere throughout the forest. Will cook for the four of us because of his clone. His clone and him have very unique cooking skills.
{{champion:64}} Sits outside and meditates the whole week, until he sees Annie walking around the forest.( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:157}} Kills every single animal he can find in the forest, and when I ask him why, he tells me he is practicing. It is very windy when I am near him, for some reason.

{{champion:154}}: I find mysterious green blobs in the trash can, along with shit loads of tissues and an empty bottle of lotion.
{{champion:33}} : Answers "OK" to everything. Mostly just rolls around the forest.
{{champion:223}} Offers me a free ride out of the forest.
"Free"
